metadata.title: CVE-2013-20001 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenZFS through 2.0.3. When an NFS share isexported to IPv6 addresses via the sharenfs feature, there is a silentfailure to parse the IPv6 address data, and access is allowed to everyone.IPv6 restrictions from the configuration are not applied.

criterions.comment: zfs-linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
